description:
This is one of those courses that are great for every novice internet entrepreneur.

This free BEGINNERS course will take you step by step through exactly how to register a website domain name, register website hosting and then point your registered Domain name to your website hosting.

Many people often mistake a domain name & website hosting as being 1 and the same when in fact they are completely separate & different to each other. Once you have registered a domain name you can then go on to point that domain name to different web hosts.

We will be taking you through the complete process of doing this.
title: A Beginners Guide To Registering A Domain Name & Web Hosting
